description: Café Quindío, founded as a family business 35 years ago, aims to produce high-quality coffee that represents Colombia's rich coffee culture. The initiative focuses on generating added value, employment, and social development while promoting biodiversity through art. With a commitment to sustainability, the company utilizes solar energy, supports local coffee growers, and engages in social projects, all while striving to transform lives through coffee and create a unique brand experience.
name: Café Quindío
